text:
Memo from the desk of:
betty McKenzie
NAEB Publication Editor
7/18/63
To Frank Schooley
Dear Frank:
Your compilation of data from
the Publication Committee members arrived while
I was on vacation, and I've just had a chance
to glance at it now. I think it will be quite
helpful to me in trying to decide about
articles to maintain "editorial balance." Also,
of course, it will be brought to the attention
of the current committee, and Walter Emery and
Pres Holmes.
Thanks very much.
Sincerely,
